classes.name: Artificer
classes.description: A master of invention who uses ingenuity and magic to unlock extraordinary capabilities in objects.

classes.name: Barbarian
classes.description: A fierce warrior who can enter a battle rage.

classes.name: Bard
classes.description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power.

classes.name: Druid
classes.description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature and adopting animal forms.

classes.name: Fighter
classes.description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor.

classes.name: Monk
classes.description: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection.

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath.

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: A warrior who combats threats on the edges of civilization.

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies.

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline.

classes.name: Warlock
classes.description: A wielder of magic derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity.

classes.name: Wizard
classes.description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality.

races.name: Aasimar
races.description: Celestial-touched with healing hands and divine transformation.

races.name: Dragonborn
races.description: Dragon-kin with a breath weapon, damage resistance, and draconic flight.

races.name: Drow
races.description: Elves of the Underdark with superior darkvision and innate magic.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Resilient and tough, with poison resistance and stonecunning.

races.name: Forest Gnome
races.description: Small and cunning, with a knack for illusion and speaking with beasts.

races.name: Goliath
races.description: Towering giant-kin with powerful build and giant ancestry.

races.name: Halfling
races.description: Small, brave, and lucky, with natural stealth.

races.name: High Elf
races.description: Elves with arcane talent and a flexible wizard cantrip.

races.name: Human
races.description: Resourceful, skillful, and versatile â€” the most adaptable species.

races.name: Orc
races.description: Hardy and fierce, with adrenaline rush and relentless endurance.

races.name: Rock Gnome
races.description: Inventive and cunning, with tinker's magic.

races.name: Tiefling
races.description: Fiend-touched with Thaumaturgy. Choose a legacy for full traits.

races.name: Tiefling (Abyssal)
races.description: Abyssal legacy: poison resistance, Poison Spray, Ray of Sickness, Hold Person.

races.name: Tiefling (Chthonic)
races.description: Chthonic legacy: necrotic resistance, Chill Touch, False Life, Ray of Enfeeblement.

races.name: Tiefling (Infernal)
races.description: Infernal legacy: fire resistance, Fire Bolt, Hellish Rebuke, Darkness.

races.name: Wood Elf
races.description: Fleet-footed elves with Druidcraft and woodland magic.

backgrounds.name: Acolyte
backgrounds.description: Temple servant with sacred rites. Feat: Magic Initiate (Cleric).

backgrounds.name: Artisan
backgrounds.description: Skilled craftsperson and guild member. Feat: Crafter.

backgrounds.name: Charlatan
backgrounds.description: Con artist with a silver tongue. Feat: Skilled.

backgrounds.name: Criminal
backgrounds.description: Experienced lawbreaker with underworld contacts. Feat: Alert.

backgrounds.name: Entertainer
backgrounds.description: Performer who thrives before an audience. Feat: Musician.

backgrounds.name: Farmer
backgrounds.description: Hardy worker of the land. Feat: Tough.

backgrounds.name: Guard
backgrounds.description: Trained sentinel who keeps watch. Feat: Alert.

backgrounds.name: Guide
backgrounds.description: Wilderness expert and pathfinder. Feat: Magic Initiate (Druid).

backgrounds.name: Hermit
backgrounds.description: Recluse who discovered a deep truth. Feat: Healer.

backgrounds.name: Merchant
backgrounds.description: Trader with a nose for profit. Feat: Lucky.

backgrounds.name: Noble
backgrounds.description: Aristocrat raised in wealth and privilege. Feat: Skilled.

backgrounds.name: Sage
backgrounds.description: Scholar devoted to learning. Feat: Magic Initiate (Wizard).

backgrounds.name: Sailor
backgrounds.description: Seafarer hardened by storms. Feat: Tavern Brawler.

backgrounds.name: Scribe
backgrounds.description: Keeper of records and lore. Feat: Skilled.

backgrounds.name: Soldier
backgrounds.description: Military veteran of rank and discipline. Feat: Savage Attacker.

backgrounds.name: Wayfarer
backgrounds.description: Wanderer who survives by luck and wits. Feat: Lucky.
